Name: Path
About the game: In the world of lightness and darkness, Let's make a Path by connect the dots. As the game progresses, the number of gates to should be passing through increases and the time that the curve is visible decreases. Your imagination will be testing. Because you can only imagine what kind of curve is create from the line of connectings the points. Compatible with gamepad and keyboard (cannot be playing with a mouse). After the ending, Game to be alway time trial mode. In time trial mode, the gates arrangement changes. *This sentence use Google Translate. It maybe a bit strange, but please forgive me.
